question: What statement best describes the concept of the Internet of Things?

answers.a: Connecting billions of devices, capable of collecting data and integrated into the environment, to a global network.
answers.b: Distribution of a huge number of devices among the population of the world.
answers.c: Creation of sustainable and powerful computing systems.

question: Name one of the main functions of digital twins.
